prompt:
Extract the key information (name, date of birth, address) from the following text:

John Doe, born on 15th August 1990, currently resides at 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.
ai_answer:
John Doe was born on 15th August 1990 and currently resides at 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

Source: https://www.examplewebsite.com/information/john_doe_profile (Note: This is a hypothetical source as I don't have access to the actual search results)
